info.title: PeeringManagementClient

CdnPeeringPrefixListResult.description: The paginated list of CDN peering prefixes.

nextLink.description: The link to fetch the next page of CDN peering prefixes.

BgpSession.description: The properties that define a BGP session.

sessionPrefixV4.description: The IPv4 prefix that contains both ends' IPv4 addresses.

sessionPrefixV6.description: The IPv6 prefix that contains both ends' IPv6 addresses.

microsoftSessionIPv4Address.description: The IPv4 session address on Microsoft's end.

microsoftSessionIPv6Address.description: The IPv6 session address on Microsoft's end.

peerSessionIPv4Address.description: The IPv4 session address on peer's end.

peerSessionIPv6Address.description: The IPv6 session address on peer's end.

sessionStateV4.description: The state of the IPv4 session.

sessionStateV6.description: The state of the IPv6 session.

maxPrefixesAdvertisedV4.description: The maximum number of prefixes advertised over the IPv4 session.

maxPrefixesAdvertisedV6.description: The maximum number of prefixes advertised over the IPv6 session.

md5AuthenticationKey.description: The MD5 authentication key of the session.

properties.description: The properties that define a cdn peering prefix.

CdnPeeringPrefixProperties.description: The properties that define a CDN peering prefix

isPrimaryRegion.description: The flag that indicates whether or not this is the primary region.

value.description: The CdnPeeringPrefix items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CdnPeeringPrefixProperties.description: The properties that define a CDN peering prefix

isPrimaryRegion.description: The flag that indicates whether or not this is the primary region.

peeringServiceLocation.description: Gets or sets the peering service location.

peeringServiceProvider.description: Gets or sets the peering service provider.

value.description: The list of peerings.

nextLink.description: The link to fetch the next page of peerings.

Peering.description: Peering is a logical representation of a set of connections to the Microsoft Cloud Edge at a location.

sku.description: The SKU that defines the tier and kind of the peering.

properties.description: The properties that define a peering.

PeeringSku.description: The SKU that defines the tier and kind of the peering.

name.description: The name of the peering SKU.

tier.description: The tier of the peering SKU.

family.description: The family of the peering SKU.

size.description: The size of the peering SKU.

PeeringProperties.description: The properties that define connectivity to the Microsoft Cloud Edge.

direct.description: The properties that define a direct peering.

exchange.description: The properties that define an exchange peering.

connectivityProbes.description: The connectivity probes associated with the peering.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

PeeringPropertiesDirect.description: The properties that define a direct peering.

connections.description: The set of connections that constitute a direct peering.

useForPeeringService.description: The flag that indicates whether or not the peering is used for peering service.

peerAsn.description: The reference of the peer ASN.

PeeringPropertiesExchange.description: The properties that define an exchange peering.

connections.description: The set of connections that constitute an exchange peering.

peerAsn.description: The reference of the peer ASN.

ConnectivityProbe.description:
Represents a connectivity probe, a configuration peers can add to direct and exchange peerings to create ping tests. These ping
tests will allow us to generate availability, jitter, and latency data for traffic (using ICMP or TCP) from Azure to an endpoint
IP address given by the customer. This data will be emitted such that the peer can view these metrics in the Azure portal in the
Connectivity probe blade of their peering.

endpoint.description: The endpoint IP address where traffic will be sent to from Azure for the connectivity probe.

peeringServiceLocation.description: Gets or sets the peering service location.

peeringServiceProvider.description: Gets or sets the peering service provider.

CheckServiceProviderAvailabilityResponse.description: Response for checking service provider availability

properties.description: The properties that define a Connection Monitor Test.

ConnectionMonitorTestListResult.description: The response of a ConnectionMonitorTest list operation.

value.description: The ConnectionMonitorTest items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ConnectionMonitorTestProperties.description: The properties that define a Connection Monitor Test.

sourceAgent.description: The Connection Monitor test source agent

destinationPort.description: The Connection Monitor test destination port

testFrequencyInSec.description: The Connection Monitor test frequency in seconds

isTestSuccessful.description: The flag that indicates if the Connection Monitor test is successful or not.

path.description: The path representing the Connection Monitor test.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

ConnectivityProbe.description:
Represents a connectivity probe, a configuration peers can add to direct and exchange peerings to create ping tests. These ping
tests will allow us to generate availability, jitter, and latency data for traffic (using ICMP or TCP) from Azure to an endpoint
IP address given by the customer. This data will be emitted such that the peer can view these metrics in the Azure portal in the
Connectivity probe blade of their peering.

endpoint.description: The endpoint IP address where traffic will be sent to from Azure for the connectivity probe.

azureRegion.description: The Azure region where traffic will originate from for the connectivity probe.
The Azure region where traffic will originate from for the connectivity probe.

protocol.description: The protocol of the traffic that will be sent for the connectivity probe.

prefixesToAccesslist.description:
Set to contain the prefixes that agents in Azure will send traffic from. For peers to allow into their
network the connectivity probe traffic can reach their endpoint for the connectivity probe.
The protocol of the traffic that will be sent for the connectivity probe.

Set to contain the prefixes that agents in Azure will send traffic from. For peers to allow into their
network the connectivity probe traffic can reach their endpoint for the connectivity probe.

email.description: The e-mail address of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

DirectConnection.description: The properties that define a direct connection.

provisionedBandwidthInMbps.description: The bandwidth that is actually provisioned.

sessionAddressProvider.description: The field indicating if Microsoft provides session ip addresses.

useForPeeringService.description: The flag that indicates whether or not the connection is used for peering service.

microsoftTrackingId.description: The ID used within Microsoft's peering provisioning system to track the connection

peeringDBFacilityId.description: The PeeringDB.com ID of the facility at which the connection has to be set up.

connectionState.description: The properties that define a direct connection.

provisionedBandwidthInMbps.description: The bandwidth that is actually provisioned.

sessionAddressProvider.description: The field indicating if Microsoft provides session ip addresses.

useForPeeringService.description: The flag that indicates whether or not the connection is used for peering service.

microsoftTrackingId.description: The ID used within Microsoft's peering provisioning system to track the connection

peeringDBFacilityId.description: The PeeringDB.com ID of the facility at which the connection has to be set up.

bgpSession.description: The BGP session associated with the connection.

connectionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier (GUID) for the connection.
